name: Rending Vortex
description: When your Dvalin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when Total Collapse attached to opposing active character is removed: Apply Total Collapse to the next opposing standby character. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When your $[A2502], who has this card equipped, is on the field, when <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C125021]</color> attached to opposing active character is removed: Apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C125021]</color> to the next opposing standby character. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When your Dvalin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, when <color=#FFFFFFFF>Total Collapse</color> attached to opposing active character is removed: Apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>Total Collapse</color> to the next opposing standby character. (Once per Round)
